system.description:
WHEN YOU LEAD A FLIGHT TO A TARGET...
...BY DAYLIGHT , or to your airbase at any time, you find it.
...AT NIGHT , roll +skill.

failure.label: Miss
failure.value: Either scrub the mission and return in shame, or strike the target late and alone, forcing you to make your own Attack Run. Planes relying on your navigation can choose which miss condition they would prefer.

partial.label: Partial Hit
partial.value:
You find it and choose one consequence:

  • Your plane suffers a minor mechanical failure (plane is damaged)
  • They are waiting for you (triggers Enemy Fire)
  • You’re stressed or banged around (split 2 harm however you want)

success.label: Full Hit!
success.value: You find it and line up a textbook approach.
